title: Oxymeris lineopunctata
text:
Oxymeris lineopunctata is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Terebridae">Terebridae</a>, the auger snails.
Description.
The maximum length of the shell is 7.4 mm.
Distribution.
This marine species occurs off <a href="Madagascar">Madagascar</a>.
